SELECT * FROM ((SELECT F."shichosonCode" , 0 AS niTeiJokyo , F."shichosonMeisho" , A."shoKisaiHokenshaNo"
,A."ninteiShinseiShinseijiKubunCode"
,A."ninteiShinseiHoreiKubunCode"
,COUNT(A."shoKisaiHokenshaNo") AS countKensu FROM rgdb."DbT5101NinteiShinseiJoho" A INNER JOIN rgdb."DbT5105NinteiKanryoJoho" B ON A."shinseishoKanriNo" = B."shinseishoKanriNo" LEFT JOIN rgdb."DbT5502ShinsakaiWariateJoho" D ON A."shinseishoKanriNo" = D."shinseishoKanriNo" INNER JOIN rgdb."DbT5501ShinsakaiKaisaiYoteiJoho" E ON D."shinsakaiKaisaiNo" = E."shinsakaiKaisaiNo" INNER JOIN rgdb."DbT7051KoseiShichosonMaster" F ON A."shoKisaiHokenshaNo" = F."shoKisaiHokenshaNo" WHERE A."logicalDeletedFlag" = FALSE
AND SUBSTR(B."ninteiShinseiJohoTorokuKanryoYMD", 1, 6) = #{taishoNendoYM}
AND #{taishoGeppiFrom} <= B."ninteiShinseiJohoTorokuKanryoYMD"
AND #{taishoGeppiFrom} <= B."ninteiShinseiJohoTorokuKanryoYMD" AND B."ninteiShinseiJohoTorokuKanryoYMD" <= #{taishoGeppiTo}
AND B."ninteiShinseiJohoTorokuKanryoYMD" <= #{taishoGeppiTo}
AND A."ninteiShinseiShinseijiKubunCode" IN ('1', '2', '3')
AND A."ninteiShinseiHoreiKubunCode" IN ('1', '2', '3')
GROUP BY F."shichosonCode" ,F."shichosonMeisho" ,A."shoKisaiHokenshaNo"
,A."ninteiShinseiShinseijiKubunCode"
,A."ninteiShinseiHoreiKubunCode"
ORDER BY F."shichosonCode"
,A."ninteiShinseiShinseijiKubunCode"
,A."ninteiShinseiHoreiKubunCode" ) UNION ALL (SELECT F."shichosonCode" , 1 AS niTeiJokyo , F."shichosonMeisho" , A."shoKisaiHokenshaNo"
,A."ninteiShinseiShinseijiKubunCode"
,A."ninteiShinseiHoreiKubunCode"
,COUNT(A."shoKisaiHokenshaNo") AS countKensu FROM rgdb."DbT5101NinteiShinseiJoho" A INNER JOIN rgdb."DbT5105NinteiKanryoJoho" B ON A."shinseishoKanriNo" = B."shinseishoKanriNo" LEFT JOIN rgdb."DbT5202NinteichosahyoGaikyoChosa" G ON A."shinseishoKanriNo" = G."shinseishoKanriNo" AND G."ninteichosaRirekiNo" = ( SELECT MAX("ninteichosaRirekiNo") FROM rgdb."DbT5202NinteichosahyoGaikyoChosa" WHERE "shinseishoKanriNo" = A."shinseishoKanriNo") LEFT JOIN rgdb."DbT5502ShinsakaiWariateJoho" D ON A."shinseishoKanriNo" = D."shinseishoKanriNo" INNER JOIN rgdb."DbT5501ShinsakaiKaisaiYoteiJoho" E ON D."shinsakaiKaisaiNo" = E."shinsakaiKaisaiNo" INNER JOIN rgdb."DbT7051KoseiShichosonMaster" F ON A."shoKisaiHokenshaNo" = F."shoKisaiHokenshaNo" WHERE A."logicalDeletedFlag" = FALSE
AND SUBSTR(G."ninteichosaJisshiYMD", 1, 6) = #{taishoNendoYM}
AND #{taishoGeppiFrom} <= G."ninteichosaJisshiYMD"
AND #{taishoGeppiFrom} <= G."ninteichosaJisshiYMD" AND G."ninteichosaJisshiYMD" <= #{taishoGeppiTo}
AND G."ninteichosaJisshiYMD" <= #{taishoGeppiTo}
AND A."ninteiShinseiShinseijiKubunCode" IN ('1', '2', '3')
AND A."ninteiShinseiHoreiKubunCode" IN ('1', '2', '3')
GROUP BY F."shichosonCode" ,F."shichosonMeisho" ,A."shoKisaiHokenshaNo"
,A."ninteiShinseiShinseijiKubunCode"
,A."ninteiShinseiHoreiKubunCode"
ORDER BY F."shichosonCode"
,A."ninteiShinseiShinseijiKubunCode"
,A."ninteiShinseiHoreiKubunCode" ) UNION ALL (SELECT F."shichosonCode" , 2 AS niTeiJokyo , F."shichosonMeisho" , A."shoKisaiHokenshaNo"
,A."ninteiShinseiShinseijiKubunCode"
,A."ninteiShinseiHoreiKubunCode"
,COUNT(A."shoKisaiHokenshaNo") AS countKensu FROM rgdb."DbT5101NinteiShinseiJoho" A INNER JOIN rgdb."DbT5105NinteiKanryoJoho" B ON A."shinseishoKanriNo" = B."shinseishoKanriNo" LEFT JOIN rgdb."DbT5502ShinsakaiWariateJoho" D ON A."shinseishoKanriNo" = D."shinseishoKanriNo" INNER JOIN rgdb."DbT5501ShinsakaiKaisaiYoteiJoho" E ON D."shinsakaiKaisaiNo" = E."shinsakaiKaisaiNo" INNER JOIN rgdb."DbT5511ShinsakaiKaisaiKekkaJoho" H ON D."shinsakaiKaisaiNo" = H."shinsakaiKaisaiNo" INNER JOIN rgdb."DbT7051KoseiShichosonMaster" F ON A."shoKisaiHokenshaNo" = F."shoKisaiHokenshaNo" WHERE A."logicalDeletedFlag" = FALSE
AND SUBSTR(B."ninteiShinsakaiWariateKanryoYMD", 1, 6) = #{taishoNendoYM}
AND #{taishoGeppiFrom} <= B."ninteiShinsakaiWariateKanryoYMD"
AND #{taishoGeppiFrom} <= B."ninteiShinsakaiWariateKanryoYMD" AND B."ninteiShinsakaiWariateKanryoYMD" <= #{taishoGeppiTo}
AND B."ninteiShinsakaiWariateKanryoYMD" <= #{taishoGeppiTo}
AND A."ninteiShinseiShinseijiKubunCode" IN ('1', '2', '3')
AND A."ninteiShinseiHoreiKubunCode" IN ('1', '2', '3')
GROUP BY F."shichosonCode" ,F."shichosonMeisho" ,A."shoKisaiHokenshaNo"
,A."ninteiShinseiShinseijiKubunCode"
,A."ninteiShinseiHoreiKubunCode"
ORDER BY F."shichosonCode"
,A."ninteiShinseiShinseijiKubunCode"
,A."ninteiShinseiHoreiKubunCode" ) UNION ALL (SELECT F."shichosonCode" , 3 AS niTeiJokyo , F."shichosonMeisho" , A."shoKisaiHokenshaNo"
,A."ninteiShinseiShinseijiKubunCode"
,A."ninteiShinseiHoreiKubunCode"
,COUNT(A."shoKisaiHokenshaNo") AS countKensu FROM rgdb."DbT5101NinteiShinseiJoho" A INNER JOIN rgdb."DbT5105NinteiKanryoJoho" B ON A."shinseishoKanriNo" = B."shinseishoKanriNo" INNER JOIN rgdb."DbT5102NinteiKekkaJoho" C ON A."shinseishoKanriNo" = C."shinseishoKanriNo" LEFT JOIN rgdb."DbT5502ShinsakaiWariateJoho" D ON A."shinseishoKanriNo" = D."shinseishoKanriNo" INNER JOIN rgdb."DbT5501ShinsakaiKaisaiYoteiJoho" E ON D."shinsakaiKaisaiNo" = E."shinsakaiKaisaiNo" INNER JOIN rgdb."DbT7051KoseiShichosonMaster" F ON A."shoKisaiHokenshaNo" = F."shoKisaiHokenshaNo" WHERE A."logicalDeletedFlag" = FALSE
AND SUBSTR(C."nijiHanteiYMD", 1, 6) = #{taishoNendoYM}
AND #{taishoGeppiFrom} <= C."nijiHanteiYMD"
AND #{taishoGeppiFrom} <= C."nijiHanteiYMD" AND C."nijiHanteiYMD" <= #{taishoGeppiTo}
AND C."nijiHanteiYMD" <= #{taishoGeppiTo}
AND A."ninteiShinseiShinseijiKubunCode" IN ('1', '2', '3')
AND A."ninteiShinseiHoreiKubunCode" IN ('1', '2', '3')
GROUP BY F."shichosonCode" ,F."shichosonMeisho" ,A."shoKisaiHokenshaNo"
,A."ninteiShinseiShinseijiKubunCode"
,A."ninteiShinseiHoreiKubunCode"
ORDER BY F."shichosonCode"
,A."ninteiShinseiShinseijiKubunCode"
,A."ninteiShinseiHoreiKubunCode" )) jisshiJokyoTokei ORDER BY "shichosonCode" , niTeiJokyo
, "ninteiShinseiShinseijiKubunCode"
, "ninteiShinseiHoreiKubunCode"

SELECT DISTINCT ON (dbt5591."gogitaiNo") "gogitaiNo" ,dbt5591."gogitaiMei" FROM rgdb."DbT5591GogitaiJoho" dbt5591 WHERE dbt5591."gogitaiYukoKikanKaishiYMD" <= #{systemDate} AND #{systemDate} <= dbt5591."gogitaiYukoKikanShuryoYMD"

SELECT SUBSTR(B."nijiHanteiYMD", 1, 6) AS nijiHanteiYM ,B."nijiHanteiYokaigoJotaiKubunCode" ,A."hihokenshaKubunCode" ,A."age" ,A."shoKisaiHokenshaNo"
,A."ninteiShinseiShinseijiKubunCode"
,A."ninteiShinseiHoreiKubunCode"
,C."shichosonCode" ,C."shichosonMeisho" FROM rgdb."DbT5101NinteiShinseiJoho" A INNER JOIN rgdb."DbT5102NinteiKekkaJoho" B ON A."shinseishoKanriNo" = B."shinseishoKanriNo" INNER JOIN rgdb."DbT5105NinteiKanryoJoho" D ON A."shinseishoKanriNo" = D."shinseishoKanriNo" INNER JOIN rgdb."DbT7051KoseiShichosonMaster" C ON A."shoKisaiHokenshaNo" = C."shoKisaiHokenshaNo" WHERE A."logicalDeletedFlag" = FALSE AND D."ninteiShinseiJohoTorokuKanryoYMD" IS NOT NULL AND D."ninteichosaIraiKanryoYMD" IS NOT NULL AND D."ninteichosaKanryoYMD" IS NOT NULL AND D."ikenshoSakuseiIraiKanryoYMD" IS NOT NULL AND D."ikenshoTorokuKanryoYMD" IS NOT NULL AND D."ichijiHanteiKanryoYMD" IS NOT NULL AND D."maskingKanryoYMD" IS NOT NULL AND D."ninteiShinsakaiWariateKanryoYMD" IS NOT NULL AND D."ninteiShinsakaiKanryoYMD" IS NOT NULL AND A."hihokenshaKubunCode" IN ('1', '2') AND B."nijiHanteiYokaigoJotaiKubunCode" IN ('01', '12', '13', '21', '22', '23', '24', '25')
AND A."shoKisaiHokenshaNo" = #{hokensyaNo}
AND SUBSTR(B."nijiHanteiYMD", 1, 6) = #{taishoNendoYM}
AND #{taishoGeppiFrom} <= B."nijiHanteiYMD" AND B."nijiHanteiYMD" <= #{taishoGeppiTo}
AND #{taishoGeppiFrom} <= B."nijiHanteiYMD"
AND B."nijiHanteiYMD" <= #{taishoGeppiTo}
AND A."ninteiShinseiShinseijiKubunCode" IN ('1', '2', '3')
AND A."ninteiShinseiHoreiKubunCode" IN ('1', '2', '3')
GROUP BY C."shichosonCode" ,C."shichosonMeisho" ,A."shoKisaiHokenshaNo" ,A."hihokenshaKubunCode" ,A."age" ,B."nijiHanteiYokaigoJotaiKubunCode" ,B."nijiHanteiYMD"
,A."ninteiShinseiShinseijiKubunCode"
,A."ninteiShinseiHoreiKubunCode"
ORDER BY C."shichosonCode" ,A."shoKisaiHokenshaNo" ,A."hihokenshaKubunCode" ,A."age"
,A."ninteiShinseiShinseijiKubunCode"
,A."ninteiShinseiHoreiKubunCode"

SELECT A."nijiHanteiYM" ,A."shichosonCode" ,A."shichosonMeisho" ,A."shoKisaiHokenshaNo" ,A."nijiHanteiYokaigoJotaiKubunCode" ,A."hihokenshaKubunCode" ,COUNT(0) AS countHokensha FROM "JigyoJyokyoHokokuTemp" A GROUP BY A."nijiHanteiYM" ,A."shichosonCode" ,A."shichosonMeisho" ,A."shoKisaiHokenshaNo" ,A."nijiHanteiYokaigoJotaiKubunCode" ,A."hihokenshaKubunCode" ORDER BY A."nijiHanteiYM" ,A."shichosonCode" ,A."hihokenshaKubunCode" ,A."nijiHanteiYokaigoJotaiKubunCode"

SELECT S.* , (SELECT COUNT (*) FROM (SELECT COUNT(G."shinsakaiKaisaiNo") FROM rgdb."DbT5511ShinsakaiKaisaiKekkaJoho" G INNER JOIN rgdb."DbT5502ShinsakaiWariateJoho" dbt5502 ON G."shinsakaiKaisaiNo" = dbt5502."shinsakaiKaisaiNo" INNER JOIN rgdb."DbT5101NinteiShinseiJoho" dbt5101 ON dbt5502."shinseishoKanriNo" = dbt5101."shinseishoKanriNo" WHERE dbt5101."shoKisaiHokenshaNo" = S."shoKisaiHokenshaNo"
AND S.gogitaiNo = G."gogitaiNo"
AND SUBSTR(G."shinsakaiKaisaiYMD", 1, 6) = #{taishoNendoYM}
AND #{taishoGeppiFrom} <= G."shinsakaiKaisaiYMD" AND G."shinsakaiKaisaiYMD" <= #{taishoGeppiTo}
AND #{taishoGeppiFrom} <= G."shinsakaiKaisaiYMD"
AND G."shinsakaiKaisaiYMD" <= #{taishoGeppiTo}
Group BY G."shinsakaiKaisaiNo" ) AS shinsakaiIinCount ) AS shinsakaiKaisaiNoCount FROM (SELECT
A."gogitaiNo" AS gogitaiNo, E."gogitaiMei",
F."shichosonCode" ,F."shichosonMeisho" ,C."shoKisaiHokenshaNo"
,C."ninteiShinseiShinseijiKubunCode"
,C."ninteiShinseiHoreiKubunCode"
,MIN(A."shinsakaiKaisaiYMD") AS shinsakaiKaisaiYMDMin ,MAX(A."shinsakaiKaisaiYMD") AS shinsakaiKaisaiYMDMax FROM rgdb."DbT5511ShinsakaiKaisaiKekkaJoho" A LEFT JOIN rgdb."DbT5502ShinsakaiWariateJoho" B ON A."shinsakaiKaisaiNo" = B."shinsakaiKaisaiNo" LEFT JOIN rgdb."DbT5101NinteiShinseiJoho" C ON B."shinseishoKanriNo" = C."shinseishoKanriNo" INNER JOIN rgdb."DbT5105NinteiKanryoJoho" D ON D."shinseishoKanriNo" = C."shinseishoKanriNo" LEFT JOIN rgdb."DbT5591GogitaiJoho" E ON A."gogitaiNo" = E."gogitaiNo" AND E."gogitaiYukoKikanKaishiYMD" <= TO_CHAR(NOW(), 'YYYYMMDD') AND TO_CHAR(NOW(), 'YYYYMMDD') <= E."gogitaiYukoKikanShuryoYMD" INNER JOIN rgdb."DbT7051KoseiShichosonMaster" F ON C."shoKisaiHokenshaNo" = F."shoKisaiHokenshaNo" WHERE D."ninteiShinseiJohoTorokuKanryoYMD" IS NOT NULL AND D."ninteichosaKanryoYMD" IS NOT NULL AND D."ikenshoTorokuKanryoYMD" IS NOT NULL AND D."ichijiHanteiKanryoYMD" IS NOT NULL AND D."maskingKanryoYMD" IS NOT NULL AND D."ninteichosaKanryoYMD" IS NOT NULL
AND C."shoKisaiHokenshaNo" = #{hokensyaNo}
AND C."hihokenshaKubunCode" IN ('1', '2', '3')
AND C."hihokenshaKubunCode" = '1'
AND C."hihokenshaKubunCode" = '2'
AND C."hihokenshaKubunCode" = '3'
AND C."hihokenshaKubunCode" IN ('1', '2')
AND C."hihokenshaKubunCode" IN ('1', '3')
AND C."hihokenshaKubunCode" IN ('2', '3')
AND SUBSTR(A."shinsakaiKaisaiYMD", 1, 6) = #{taishoNendoYM}
AND #{taishoGeppiFrom} <= A."shinsakaiKaisaiYMD" AND A."shinsakaiKaisaiYMD" <= #{taishoGeppiTo}
AND #{taishoGeppiFrom} <= A."shinsakaiKaisaiYMD"
AND A."shinsakaiKaisaiYMD" <= #{taishoGeppiTo}
AND A."gogitaiNo" = #{gogitaiNo}
AND A."gogitaiNo" IN #{gogitaiNo}
AND C."ninteiShinseiShinseijiKubunCode" IN ('1', '2', '3')
AND C."ninteiShinseiHoreiKubunCode" IN ('1', '2', '3')
GROUP BY
A."gogitaiNo", E."gogitaiMei",
F."shichosonCode" ,F."shichosonMeisho" ,C."shoKisaiHokenshaNo"
,C."ninteiShinseiShinseijiKubunCode"
,C."ninteiShinseiHoreiKubunCode"
ORDER BY
A."gogitaiNo",
F."shichosonCode" ,C."shoKisaiHokenshaNo"
,C."ninteiShinseiShinseijiKubunCode"
,C."ninteiShinseiHoreiKubunCode" ) AS S

SELECT E."ichijiHanteiKekkaNinchishoKasanCode" , D."nijiHanteiYokaigoJotaiKubunCode"
,C."ninteiShinseiShinseijiKubunCode"
,C."ninteiShinseiHoreiKubunCode"
, COUNT(C."hihokenshaNo") AS hihokenshaCount FROM rgdb."DbT5511ShinsakaiKaisaiKekkaJoho" A LEFT JOIN rgdb."DbT5502ShinsakaiWariateJoho" B ON A."shinsakaiKaisaiNo" = B."shinsakaiKaisaiNo" LEFT JOIN rgdb."DbT5101NinteiShinseiJoho" C ON B."shinseishoKanriNo" = C."shinseishoKanriNo" INNER JOIN rgdb."DbT5102NinteiKekkaJoho" D ON C."shinseishoKanriNo" = D."shinseishoKanriNo" INNER JOIN rgdb."DbT5116IchijiHanteiKekkaJoho" E ON C."shinseishoKanriNo" = E."shinseishoKanriNo" INNER JOIN rgdb."DbT5105NinteiKanryoJoho" F ON C."shinseishoKanriNo" = F."shinseishoKanriNo" LEFT JOIN rgdb."DbT5591GogitaiJoho" G ON A."gogitaiNo" = G."gogitaiNo" AND G."gogitaiYukoKikanKaishiYMD" <= TO_CHAR(NOW(), 'YYYYMMDD') AND TO_CHAR(NOW(), 'YYYYMMDD') <= G."gogitaiYukoKikanShuryoYMD" LEFT JOIN rgdb."DbT7051KoseiShichosonMaster" H ON C."shoKisaiHokenshaNo" = H."shoKisaiHokenshaNo" WHERE
A."gogitaiNo" = #{gogitaiNo}
AND A."gogitaiNo" IN #{gogitaiNo}
AND #{taishoGeppiFrom} <= A."shinsakaiKaisaiYMD" AND A."shinsakaiKaisaiYMD" <= #{taishoGeppiTo} AND H."shichosonCode" = #{shichosonCode} AND F."ninteiShinseiJohoTorokuKanryoYMD" IS NOT NULL AND F."ninteichosaKanryoYMD" IS NOT NULL AND F."ikenshoTorokuKanryoYMD" IS NOT NULL AND F."ichijiHanteiKanryoYMD" IS NOT NULL AND F."maskingKanryoYMD" IS NOT NULL AND F."ninteichosaKanryoYMD" IS NOT NULL AND E."ichijiHanteiKekkaNinchishoKasanCode" IN ('01', '12', '13', '21', '22', '23', '24', '25') AND D."nijiHanteiYokaigoJotaiKubunCode" IN ('01', '12', '13', '21', '22', '23', '24', '25', '31')
AND C."shoKisaiHokenshaNo" = #{hokensyaNo}
AND C."hihokenshaKubunCode" IN ('1', '2', '3')
AND C."hihokenshaKubunCode" = '1'
AND C."hihokenshaKubunCode" = '2'
AND C."hihokenshaKubunCode" = '3'
AND C."hihokenshaKubunCode" IN ('1', '2')
AND C."hihokenshaKubunCode" IN ('1', '3')
AND C."hihokenshaKubunCode" IN ('2', '3')
AND C."ninteiShinseiShinseijiKubunCode" IN ('1', '2', '3')
AND C."ninteiShinseiHoreiKubunCode" IN ('1', '2', '3')
GROUP BY E."ichijiHanteiKekkaNinchishoKasanCode" , D."nijiHanteiYokaigoJotaiKubunCode"
,C."ninteiShinseiShinseijiKubunCode"
,C."ninteiShinseiHoreiKubunCode"
ORDER BY E."ichijiHanteiKekkaNinchishoKasanCode" , D."nijiHanteiYokaigoJotaiKubunCode"
,C."ninteiShinseiShinseijiKubunCode"
,C."ninteiShinseiHoreiKubunCode"

SELECT S.* , (SELECT COUNT (*) FROM (SELECT COUNT(G."shinsakaiKaisaiNo") FROM rgdb."DbT5511ShinsakaiKaisaiKekkaJoho" G INNER JOIN rgdb."DbT5502ShinsakaiWariateJoho" dbt5502 ON G."shinsakaiKaisaiNo" = dbt5502."shinsakaiKaisaiNo" INNER JOIN rgdb."DbT5101NinteiShinseiJoho" dbt5101 ON dbt5502."shinseishoKanriNo" = dbt5101."shinseishoKanriNo" WHERE 1 = 1
AND S.gogitaiNo = G."gogitaiNo"
AND SUBSTR(G."shinsakaiKaisaiYMD", 1, 6) = #{taishoNendoYM}
AND #{taishoGeppiFrom} <= G."shinsakaiKaisaiYMD" AND G."shinsakaiKaisaiYMD" <= #{taishoGeppiTo}
AND #{taishoGeppiFrom} <= G."shinsakaiKaisaiYMD"
AND G."shinsakaiKaisaiYMD" <= #{taishoGeppiTo}
Group BY G."shinsakaiKaisaiNo" ) AS shinsakaiIinCount ) AS shinsakaiKaisaiNoCount FROM (SELECT
A."gogitaiNo" AS gogitaiNo, E."gogitaiMei",
F."shichosonCode" ,F."shichosonMeisho"
,C."ninteiShinseiShinseijiKubunCode"
,C."ninteiShinseiHoreiKubunCode"
,MIN(A."shinsakaiKaisaiYMD") AS shinsakaiKaisaiYMDMin ,MAX(A."shinsakaiKaisaiYMD") AS shinsakaiKaisaiYMDMax FROM rgdb."DbT5511ShinsakaiKaisaiKekkaJoho" A LEFT JOIN rgdb."DbT5502ShinsakaiWariateJoho" B ON A."shinsakaiKaisaiNo" = B."shinsakaiKaisaiNo" LEFT JOIN rgdb."DbT5101NinteiShinseiJoho" C ON B."shinseishoKanriNo" = C."shinseishoKanriNo" INNER JOIN rgdb."DbT5105NinteiKanryoJoho" D ON D."shinseishoKanriNo" = C."shinseishoKanriNo" LEFT JOIN rgdb."DbT5591GogitaiJoho" E ON A."gogitaiNo" = E."gogitaiNo" AND E."gogitaiYukoKikanKaishiYMD" <= TO_CHAR(NOW(), 'YYYYMMDD') AND TO_CHAR(NOW(), 'YYYYMMDD') <= E."gogitaiYukoKikanShuryoYMD" INNER JOIN rgdb."DbT7051KoseiShichosonMaster" F ON C."shoKisaiHokenshaNo" = F."shoKisaiHokenshaNo" WHERE D."ninteiShinseiJohoTorokuKanryoYMD" IS NOT NULL AND D."ninteichosaKanryoYMD" IS NOT NULL AND D."ikenshoTorokuKanryoYMD" IS NOT NULL AND D."ichijiHanteiKanryoYMD" IS NOT NULL AND D."maskingKanryoYMD" IS NOT NULL AND D."ninteichosaKanryoYMD" IS NOT NULL
AND C."shoKisaiHokenshaNo" = #{hokensyaNo}
AND C."hihokenshaKubunCode" IN ('1', '2', '3')
AND C."hihokenshaKubunCode" = '1'
AND C."hihokenshaKubunCode" = '2'
AND C."hihokenshaKubunCode" = '3'
AND C."hihokenshaKubunCode" IN ('1', '2')
AND C."hihokenshaKubunCode" IN ('1', '3')
AND C."hihokenshaKubunCode" IN ('2', '3')
AND SUBSTR(A."shinsakaiKaisaiYMD", 1, 6) = #{taishoNendoYM}
AND #{taishoGeppiFrom} <= A."shinsakaiKaisaiYMD" AND A."shinsakaiKaisaiYMD" <= #{taishoGeppiTo}
AND #{taishoGeppiFrom} <= A."shinsakaiKaisaiYMD"
AND A."shinsakaiKaisaiYMD" <= #{taishoGeppiTo}
AND A."gogitaiNo" = #{gogitaiNo}
AND A."gogitaiNo" IN #{gogitaiNo}
AND C."ninteiShinseiShinseijiKubunCode" IN ('1', '2', '3')
AND C."ninteiShinseiHoreiKubunCode" IN ('1', '2', '3')
GROUP BY
A."gogitaiNo", E."gogitaiMei",
F."shichosonCode" ,F."shichosonMeisho"
,C."ninteiShinseiShinseijiKubunCode"
,C."ninteiShinseiHoreiKubunCode"
ORDER BY
A."gogitaiNo",
F."shichosonCode"
